Description: Ostracon, small fragment of the shoulder of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and very faint traces of a black-painted text (?).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394126) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394126)
